home.title: Awọn Ojutu Ogbin Ologbon fun Africa ati Bẹẹbẹẹ
home.subtitle: Oye ogbin ti AI n ṣakoso lati mu iṣelọpọ ati ere oko rẹ pọ si

cropPlanner.title: Eto Irugbin Ologbon
cropPlanner.description: Gba awọn iṣeduro ti AI n ṣe fun awọn irugbin to dara julọ lati gbin ni ibiti o wa, ile ati oju-ọjọ

soilAdvisor.title: Itupalẹ Ilera Ile
soilAdvisor.description: Ṣe ayẹwo awọn ipo ile rẹ ki o gba awọn iṣeduro ti ara ẹni fun isakoso ounjẹ

waterOptimizer.title: Isakoso Omi
waterOptimizer.description: Mu lilo omi pọ si pẹlu eto omi ologbon ati awọn ilana itoju

marketEstimator.title: Oye Ọja
marketEstimator.description: Gba awọn iṣiro idiyele ọja ni akoko gidi ati awọn ilana tita to dara julọ fun awọn irugbin rẹ
